title: 52 - Bonjour, Internet!
description: Always in fashion and never full price, it's My Favorite Murder! This week Karen and Georgia tackle internet murderer Luka Magnotta and the unsolved case that lead to the creation of the AMBER Alert.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
